Doa dan Duka Dari Pesepak Bola Indonesia untuk Alfin Lestaluhu
01 Nov 2019, 14:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kabar meninggalnya pemain timnas Indonesia U-16, Alfin Lestaluhu mengejutkan banyak pihak. Ucapan duka pun banyak dilayangkan para pesepak bola Indonesia untuk pemain yang menghembuskan napas terakhir di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019) malam kemarin.
Seperti dilansir dari laman resmi PSSI, Alfin meninggal lantaran terkena ecephalitis (infeksi otak) dengan hypoalbumin. PSSI mengumumkan kabar ini melalui akun media sosial.
“Telah berpulang menghadap Sang Pencipta, Alfin Farhan Lestaluhu. Semoga amal ibadah dan segala kebaikan diterima Tuhan Yang Maha Esa. Terima kasih atas jasa-jasamu untuk Indonesia, Alfin,” tulis keterangan atau caption unggahan Instagram PSSI.
Kabar duka ini menyita perhatian publik hingga menjadi trending topik media sosial hingga Jumat (1/11/2019). Doa untuk Alfin terus mengalir dari berbagai kalangan, termasuk pesepak bola Tanah Air.
Para pesepak bola Indonesia baik dari kalangan pelatih hingga para yang masih bermain juga turut berbelasungkawa atas kepergian Alfin, seperti Indra Sjafri, Manahati Lestusen, dan Otavio Dutra.
Mereka turut sedih karena kehilangan bibit muda Timnas Indonesia. Alfin Lestaluhu merupakan pemain yang turut berperan dan mengantarkan Indonesia lolos ke Piala AFC U-16 2020.
Melansir dari Bola.com berikut ucapan simpati untuk Alfin Lestaluhu dari pesepak bola Indonesia.

Prayers and Grief From Indonesian Footballers for Alfin Lestaluhu
Nov 1 2019, 14:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The news of the death of the Indonesian U-16 national team player, Alfin Lestaluhu surprised many parties. Congratulations were also expressed by Indonesian footballers for the player who breathed his last at Harapan Kita Hospital, Jakarta, Thursday (10/31/2019) last night.
As reported by the official PSSI website, Alfin died due to ecephalitis (brain infection) with hypoalbumin. PSSI announced this news through social media accounts.
"Has passed away facing the Creator, Alfin Farhan Lestaluhu. May the deeds of worship and all kindness be received by God Almighty. Thank you for your services to Indonesia, Alfin, "wrote a statement or caption on Instagram PSSI uploads.
This sad news seized the public's attention until it became a trending topic on social media until Friday (11/01/2019). Prayers for Alfin continue to flow from various circles, including football players in the country.
Indonesian footballers, both from coaches to those who are still playing, also expressed their condolences for the departure of Alfin, such as Indra Sjafri, Manahati Lestusen, and Otavio Dutra.
They were also sad because they lost young Indonesian national team seeds. Alfin Lestaluhu is a player who played a role and led Indonesia to qualify for the AFC U-16 2020 2020.
Launching from Bola.com follows sympathy for Alfin Lestaluhu from Indonesian footballers.
